_source.title: Total Packets to Client by Top 5 Destination Ports
_source.visState: {"title":"Total Packets to Client by Top 5 Destination Ports","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es( q=*, split=dport:5, metric=sum:pkts_toclient, index=tst_breakup_02).label(regex='.* dport:(.*) > .*', label='$1')","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}

_source.title: Metric 3
_source.visState: {"title":"Metric 3","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".sum( .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:1, metric=cardinality:geoip.ip, index=tst_breakup_02), 1 ), .multiply( .es(q=severity:2, metric=cardinality:geoip.ip, index=tst_breakup_02),2 ) ), \n          .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:3, metric=cardinality:geoip.ip, index=tst_breakup_02), 3), .multiply( .es(q=severity:4, metric=cardinality:geoip.ip, index=tst_breakup_02),4 ) ) ).label('Metric 3: Weighted Severities by Unique IP ')","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}

_source.title: Total Packets to Client by Status
_source.visState: {"title":"Total Packets to Client by Status","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es( q=*, split=status.keyword:3, metric=sum:pkts_toclient, index=tst_breakup_02).label(regex='.* status.keyword:(.*) > .*', label='$1')","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}

_source.title: Total Packets to Client by Protocol Area
_source.visState: {"title":"Total Packets to Client by Protocol Area","type":"area","params":{"type":"area","grid":{"categoryLines":false},"categoryAxes":[{"id":"CategoryAxis-1","type":"category","position":"bottom","show":true,"style":{},"scale":{"type":"linear"},"labels":{"show":true,"truncate":100},"title":{}}],"valueAxes":[{"id":"ValueAxis-1","name":"LeftAxis-1","type":"value","position":"left","show":true,"style":{},"scale":{"type":"linear","mode":"normal"},"labels":{"show":true,"rotate":0,"filter":false,"truncate":100},"title":{"text":"Total Packets to Client"}}],"seriesParams":[{"show":"true","type":"area","mode":"stacked","data":{"label":"Total Packets to Client","id":"1"},"drawLinesBetweenPoints":true,"showCircles":true,"interpolate":"linear","valueAxis":"ValueAxis-1"}],"addTooltip":true,"addLegend":true,"legendPosition":"right","times":[],"addTimeMarker":false},"aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"sum","schema":"metric","params":{"field":"pkts_toclient","customLabel":"Total Packets to Client"}},{"id":"2","enabled":true,"type":"date_histogram","schema":"segment","params":{"field":"@timestamp","timeRange":{"from":"2019-04-24T01:09:41.712Z","to":"2019-04-27T13:49:25.933Z"},"useNormalizedEsInterval":true,"interval":"auto","drop_partials":false,"customInterval":"2h","min_doc_count":1,"extended_bounds":{}}},{"id":"3","enabled":true,"type":"terms","schema":"group","params":{"field":"protcol.keyword","size":5,"order":"desc","orderBy":"1","otherBucket":false,"otherBucketLabel":"Other","missingBucket":false,"missingBucketLabel":"Missing"}}]}

_source.title: Metric 2
_source.visState: {"title":"Metric 2","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".sum( .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:1, metric=sum:bytes_toclient, index=tst_breakup_02), 1 ), .multiply( .es(q=severity:2, metric=sum:bytes_toclient, index=tst_breakup_02),2 ) ), \n          .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:3, metric=sum:bytes_toclient, index=tst_breakup_02), 3), .multiply( .es(q=severity:4, metric=sum:bytes_toclient, index=tst_breakup_02),4 ) ) ).label('Metric 2: Weighted Severities by Bytes ')","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}

_source.title: Total Packets to Client by Protocol
_source.visState: {"title":"Total Packets to Client by Protocol","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es( q=*, split=protcol.keyword:2, metric=sum:pkts_toclient, index=tst_breakup_02).label(regex='.* protcol.keyword:(.*) > .*', label='$1')","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}

_source.title: Total Packets to Client by Top 5 IPs
_source.visState: {"title":"Total Packets to Client by Top 5 IPs","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es( q=*, split=src_ip.keyword:5, metric=sum:pkts_toclient, index=tst_breakup_02).label(regex='.* src_ip.keyword:(.*) > .*', label='$1')","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}

_source.title: Metric Relative 1
_source.visState: {"title":"Metric Relative 1","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".divide(.multiply(.divide(.sum( .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:1, metric=count), 1 ), .multiply( .es(q=severity:2, metric=count),2 ) ), \n          .sum(.multiply( .es(q=severity:3, metric=count), 3), .multiply( .es(q=severity:4, metric=count),4 ) ) ).label('Metric 1: Weighted Severities'), .sum(.sum(.es(q=severity:1, metric=count),.es(q=severity:2, metric=count)),.sum(.es(q=severity:3, metric=count),.es(q=severity:4, metric=count)))), .divide(.es(q=\"status.keyword:honeypot\", metric=count),.es(*))), .divide(.es(q=\"status.keyword:production\", metric=count),.es(*)))","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[]}
